subject: Re.: Our m..eeting
body:
Hire,
!i am here sit!t!ing in the internet caffe. Found your email an!d
decided to write. I might be coming to your place in 14 days, 
so I decided to ema!il you. May be we can meet? I am 25 y.o.
girl. I have a picture if you want. No need to reply here as 
this is no!t my email. Write me at melzi@BounceEmail.info
